00022 /*
00023  * FILE MultiDimensionalArray.h
00024  */
00025 
00026 #include "broadutil/MultiDimensionalArray.h"
00027 //
00028 #include <cassert>
00029 #include <vector>
00030 //
00031 
00032 using namespace std;
00033 
00034 MultiDimensionalArraySpec::MultiDimensionalArraySpec(const vector<size_t> &dimensions):
00035     m_dimensions(dimensions)
00036 {
00037   assert(m_dimensions.size() > 1);
00038   m_numElements = 1;
00039   for (vector<size_t>::const_iterator it = m_dimensions.begin();
00040        it != m_dimensions.end(); ++it) {
00041     m_numElements *= *it;
00042   }
00043 }
00044 
00045 size_t MultiDimensionalArraySpec::getIndex(const vector<size_t> &indices) const
00046 {
00047   assert(m_dimensions.size() == indices.size());
00048   size_t index = indices[0];
00049   for (size_t i = 1; i < indices.size(); ++i) {
00050     index = (index * m_dimensions[i]) + indices[i];
00051   }
00052   return index;
00053 }
00054 
00055 vector<size_t> MultiDimensionalArraySpec::getIndices(size_t index) const
00056 {
00057   vector<size_t> indices(m_dimensions.size());
00058   for (size_t i = m_dimensions.size() - 1; i > 0; --i) {
00059     indices[i] = index % m_dimensions[i];
00060     index /= m_dimensions[i];
00061   }
00062   indices[0] = index;
00063   return indices;
00064 }
